pullRequest.body:
We mostly just rewrap comment blocks and add some missing periods.

---
<!-- The text above the `---` will become the commit message when your
PR is merged. Please leave a blank newline before the `---`, otherwise
GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

For details on the "pull request lifecycle" in mathlib, please see:
https://leanprover-community.github.io/contribute/index.html

In particular, note that most reviewers will only notice your PR
if it passes the continuous integration checks.
Please ask for help on https://leanprover.zulipchat.com if needed.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

If you are moving or deleting declarations, please include these lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Moves:
- Vector.* -> Mathlib.Vector.*
- ...

Deletions:
- Nat.bit1_add_bit1
- ...

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]

-->

### PR summary [8a3e7aa8e8](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/16283/commits/8a3e7aa8e81304ed81098da97fc152cb60cc9f99)

#### Import changes for modified files

No significant changes to the import graph


<details><summary>Import changes for all files</summary>

|Files|Import difference|
|-|-|

</details>

---

#### Declarations diff

`- toStringAux1`
<details>
  <summary>You can run this locally as follows</summary>


```bash
## summary with just the declaration names:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh <optional_commit>

## more verbose report:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh long <optional_commit>
```
</details>

The doc-module for `script/declarations_diff.sh` contains some details about this script.
bors merge

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/11339355090/job/31534013286)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/11339355090/job/31534013398)

Thanks for doing this clean-up. I took a detailed look - in particular, I think a more nuanced take than "add periods everywhere" would be helpful. That said, all of these are minor comments and should be quick to address.

Thanks for doing this clean-up. I took a detailed look - in particular, I think a more nuanced take than "add periods everywhere" would be helpful. That said, all of these are minor comments and should be quick to address.

I disagree with this sentence: in my book, a docstring should have a period iff it is a complete sentence
Can you revert this one (and similar changes below; please?
That makes sense, I'll take it into account moving forward.

I would use present tense ("Print ...") and omit the full stop.
But thanks for improving this docstring; it is significantly more helpful now!
No period, please
Likewise
Likewise. You *could* do "Notation for comparing ordinals: the rest of your docstring"; that seems *even* nicer to me.
Just to illustrate: this period belongs here.
No period please, also on multiplication below
Better would be `Calculate division and remainder   : split ... means ...` (i.e., with a colon instead of a period)
Same here
No period please
Same for oPowAux2 and oPow
No period, please
No period, please: also for subtraction and multiplication
It looks like the original comments used https://sembr.org/ in this paragraph (but not below).
Makes sense, I've reverted the line wrapping.

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - doc(SetTheory/Ordinal/Notation): rewrap and improve docs

### PR summary [8a3e7aa8e8](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/16283/commits/8a3e7aa8e81304ed81098da97fc152cb60cc9f99)

#### Import changes for modified files

No significant changes to the import graph


<details><summary>Import changes for all files</summary>

|Files|Import difference|
|-|-|

</details>

---

#### Declarations diff

`- toStringAux1`
<details>
  <summary>You can run this locally as follows</summary>


```bash
## summary with just the declaration names:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh <optional_commit>

## more verbose report:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh long <optional_commit>
```
</details>

The doc-module for `script/declarations_diff.sh` contains some details about this script.

Thanks for doing this clean-up. I took a detailed look - in particular, I think a more nuanced take than "add periods everywhere" would be helpful. That said, all of these are minor comments and should be quick to address.
bors merge

Pull request successfully merged into master.
